t: Amazon.com: Millennials In Motion
s: Millennials In Motion is a California based clothing & accessories brand. Shop now for patterned tights, thigh high socks, dresses, masks and more. Our fashion designs are inspired by kawaii, lolita, alt, goth, cottagecore, grunge fairycore, and more. Made by millennials. Made for everyone.

s: August 15, 2024 - I've sold over $12M on Amazon with the wholesale model. Here's my entire blueprint for beginners: (copy this): The premise of wholesale is simple: Buy brand name products directly from the manufacturer (or a distributor). Flip those products on Amazon.

t: About Millennials In Motion
s: To address this, my father and I started this company "Millennials in Motion" to get people washable face masks quickly. We started selling just to our neighbors in San Francisco & Etsy and then started selling on Amazon, Walmart & our own brand store after getting great feedback and universal ...
